message: Let's start with a simple offer. This gives me a larger share, but you still get a significant amount upfront.
Your starting offer was a bit too greedy for me. How about we make things a bit more even? This offer still gives you a good share.

Okay Alice, you drive a hard bargain! I'm willing to move up a bit more, but this is really as high as I can go.  We're running out of time and inflation is no joke.
